title: Comment from K J Doneby Smith

analysis.key_quote: I believe the reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F would politicize the National Institutes of Health.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by expressing concerns about the politicization of the National Institutes of Health and emphasizes the need for trust in scientific integrity, which aligns with the themes of politicization and scientific integrity.
